about_the_game:
Welcome to the den of madness!


You wander into an abandoned factory chasing after a kitty that has run away. There you will find a family that has gone mad.
And the ghosts of young people who lost their lives here... Will you be able to bring the kitty home safely?
And... will you be able to get to the bottom of the ghosts' deaths and the cause of the family's madness...?

This is a 3D action game and the contents are fictional.
It is not related to any real person, group, or incident.

game description


This horror action game features a young girl who wanders into an abandoned factory in pursuit of her beloved cat, which has run away.

Her goal is to avoid relentless attacks from the “Neurons Family,” the owners of the abandoned factory, and bring back her beloved cat, but that is not enough to reach the truth...
There is a truth that can be revealed by saving the souls of the ghosts and defeating the family. There are four different endings. It will not be easy to see them all.

In order for the weak protagonist to win over the ghosts, it is important to know where and when to perform the only action he can perform, which is to “push them away.
The game's low stats, uncomfortable controls, unreasonable traps and enemies, and the inability to save will test your skills....

Distribution and live action are welcome! We hope you will spread the hardcore nature of this game to many people!
Please add it to your wish list!

Controls


Movement: WASD keys
Move viewpoint: Mouse
PUSH: Left click
